name: The Cuckoo's Nest
description:
Experience what's it like to be a barman in a cheap, but cozy bar. Engage with the various visitors, serve them drinks and try to make them feel at home. Be careful how you talk to them and what kind of drinks you serve as this affects their mood and their soberness.

Made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 

by

Boyan Spassov - programming

Dimitar Uzunov - programming

Alex Tokmakchiev - art

Martin Bakardzhiev - game design and video footage
